title: 58 Best AI Tools to Try in 2024 (Always Up-to-Date)
description: Explore the 2024 list of the best generative AI tools for marketing, writing, design, productivity management, image generation, research, and more.
content: AI's taken a bite out of our workload—automating tasks and sparking creativity in fields like content writing and graphic design. New AI tools are popping up everywhere all the time, which can make it difficult to keep track. In this mega-guide, we'll break down the 58 best AI tools for various use cases to try in 2024.[We update this list continuously to reflect the latest changes and releases.]How We Select the Best AI ToolsOur list is based on extensive research, including in-depth analysis of dozens of expert reviews. We've also tested most of these tools ourselves, so we can give you a well-rounded perspective on their capabilities and functionalities.The Best AI Tools and Software to Try in 2024Even if you already use some AI tools, checking out the latest ones can give you a big advantage. We're going to explore some of the best AI tools out there, which we've broken down into different categories so you can find exactly what you need. AI Content Creation Tools AI Rewording Tools and Grammar Checkers AI Tools for E-commerce AI Task and Project Management Tools AI Chatbots AI Research Tools AI Image Generators AI Video Generators and Editors AI for Voice and Music Generation AI Design Tools AI Podcast Tools AI for Knowledge Management AI Transcription and Meeting Assistants AI Tools for Sales AI Tools for Customer Support and Customer Service AI Tools for HR and Recruiting AI Coding Tools AI Tools for Education AI Character Generators AI Tools for Email Inbox Management AI Tools for Email Marketing AI Presentation Builders AI Scheduling ToolsAI Content Creation ToolsStruggling to keep up with the demand for fresh content? AI content creation tools speed up the way we generate text. Here are our picks.1. ContentShake AIContentShake AI is a powerful writing tool that simplifies content creation by combining generative AI with real-world SEO data from Semrush.The tool helps you: Discover content ideas that resonate with your target audience Create SEO-optimized articles quickly and easily Generate engaging social media posts to promote your content Generate high-quality AI images for your contentFirst, ContentShake AI analyzes your niche and your competition and suggests personalized content ideas proven to drive traffic.Then, it helps you compose articles based on those ideas. The tool automatically finds and integrates target keywords and search intent insights into your blog posts. It also let you generate high-quality AI images for free.ContentShake AI also provides real-time optimization tips to ensure your content is SEO-friendly and easy to read. It scores your content and suggests improvements to boost rankings and engagement. For example, ContentShake will take a long, jargon-filled sentence and rewrite it into a few short, easy-to-understand sentences. This makes your content more compelling for readers.Finally, you can instantly turn your articles into catchy social media posts with a single click. This helps drive more traffic to your content.This way, ContentShake AI simplifies every step—from generating ideas to publishing and promoting your content.Key Features The content idea generator finds trending topics for your business niche The article generator creates unlimited SEO-rich blog posts optimized for your target keywords and search intent One-click WordPress publishing lets you send articles directly to your website Intuitive blog editor with an integrated AI chatbot The content optimization feature improves your content’s SEO, readability and tone of voice Free Chrome extension generates content and improves your writing on the goPros and ConsPros: A single convenient platform for finding content ideas, writing and optimizing content, and publishing it to your website Enhances search engine rankings with Semrush's real-time SEO data Offers useful free features like AI image generation and content optimization Suitable for small businesses and teams of oneCons: Limited to content marketing use cases Less suitable for large enterprises Currently, it only generates content in EnglishPricingExplore ContentShake AI with a seven-day free trial.After that, get the paid plan for $60/month and enjoy unlimited content creation.2. JasperJasper.ai was one of the original AI content generation tools. Its features—such as Brand Voice (for writing content in your target tone of voice) and Knowledge Base—make it ideal for enterprises and large-volume content needs.It offers over 50 templates to streamline your content creation process: you can generate articles, emails, ads, product descriptions, and more. These templates make Jasper accessible to everyone.For example, you can use the Blog Post Conclusion Paragraph template to draft a conclusion:Top Features Access to a dozen models including OpenAI, Google, and Anthropic Custom "brand voice" based on your existing content generates content matching your brand's tone and style 30+ languages for global content localization Real-time collaboration for teams with multiple user seats and shared document workspacesPros and ConsPros: Chrome extension incorporates the full power of the tool Offers multiple output-editing options for changing tone, changing length, and repurposing content Lets you toggle between Speed and Quality for your outputCons: Doesn’t offer real-time SEO or competitor data Lack of a free tier makes it pricey for individual or casual users Written output requires significant human input and editingPricingThe Creator plan with one seat costs $49/month. The Pro plan costs $69/month for each seat, and the Business plan offers custom pricing.3. The AI Social Content GeneratorThe AI Social Content Generator available in the Semrush App Center helps you create engaging social media posts, captions, and hashtags within minutes. It generates ready-to-use videos from a single line of text. This makes it easy to produce content for Instagram reels, TikTok, and YouTube. You can also explore trending content from other brands on the same platform.Top Features Insights into competitors' best-performing posts and timings Consistent brand identity across posts using your brand's color palette Multiple content types including videos, carousels and posts Unlimited posts, captions, and hashtagsPros and ConsPros: Provides content ideas to overcome creator's block Offers a ton of templates to easily create trending, high-quality videos Enables creation of content at scale for Facebook, Instagram, TikTok and moreCons: Cannot automatically post or schedule content to social media profiles Video content is limited to the available templates, which may not fit all needsPricingCheck out Social Content Generator with a free trial. After that, it costs $35/month.4. Narrato AINarrato AI can be a great option for all things content. From writing blogs and social media posts to creating AI images and turning your images into text with the AI image-to-text generator, this platform has all the AI tools you need.Plus, you can create custom AI writing templates for your specific content creation needs. One unique feature is the AI autopilot for content creation - AI Content Genie. It auto-generates weekly social media posts and blog content, with no prompt or input required.Simply add your website URL and target themes in the tool’s settings once, and it will automatically create relevant and fresh content based on this week after week.Top Features Access to over 100 AI writing templates and micro tools Bulk content generation with AI Auto-generated social media posts and blog articles with AI Content Genie Easy content repurposing with AI, including images, video, and audio repurposingPros and ConsPros: Grammar and plagiarism checking Content planning, publishing, and workflow automation tools Content collaboration features for teams of all sizesCons: There is no free plan available. Users can try out the tool with the free trial No native design tools. However, users can download the Narrato app on Canva.PricingThe Pro plan is priced at $36 per month, while the Business plan starts at $96. There’s also a custom pricing option available if you want less or more of something.5. Copy.aiCopy.ai is an AI-powered platform that automates content creation and marketing workflows for go-to-market teams.Simply type out the processes you want to automate and the tool will help you do it at scale. For example, it can: Create various types of content Automate personalized sales prospecting Streamline opportunity analysis and lead enrichment Generate competitive analysis assets like battle cardsTop Features An extensive prompt library to get you started Automated workflow creation for marketing and sales operations Works with various AI models like GPT 3.5, GPT 4, Azure, and Anthropic Various templates for content creation (from content briefs to emails and ads)Pros and ConsPros: Integrates with over 2,000 tools Provides robust features to automate sales and GTM processes Supports over 90 languages for language translationCons Complicated to set up and takes time to understand Not ideal for small teams due to its complexity Doesn’t offer data-driven features for SEO content creation PricingCopy.ai offers four plans: a Free plan, Pro at $49/month, Team at $249/month, and an Enterprise plan with custom pricing.AI Rewording Tools and Grammar CheckersAI rewording tools and grammar checkers can help you improve the clarity and accuracy of your writing. Let's explore how these tools can assist you with specific aspects of your writing process.6. The goal is to make your writing more clear, concise, and engaging. This helps to create content that's easy for all audiences to read and understand.You can also use it to adapt content for various platforms and to write faster.Top Features Complex sentence simplification into clear, concise text Content accessibility and appeal enhancement Language and style adaptation for various audiences Readability and tone of voice analysis and improvementPros and ConsPros Helps ensure messaging consistency across different platforms Saves time compared to manually rewriting content Lets you track various metrics, such as word count, tone, and readability, to optimize contentCons Doesn’t have the option to select tone of voice Automated suggestions may not always fit the intended meaning or stylePricingFree to use.7. It uses AI to provide smart, context-aware suggestions. For example, you can use it to quickly polish your writing on any platform or website.You can also ask it to create new content or perform other tasks using the “Custom request” feature.Top Features Compatible with any web platform and website for performing various AI writing tasks Optimization of tone of voice and length Summarization of complex ideas and concepts Repurposing of the content for various social media platformsPros and ConsPros: Integrates AI-powered editing tools into your natural writing workflow Helps improve the tone of voice and style of your copy Simplifies and paraphrases copy in a single click Works on any website or platformCons: AI suggestions may not always capture your intended meaning. Free credits could run out quickly for high-volume writers. The Chrome extension doesn’t offer the full ContentShake AI functionality.PricingUsers on the Free plan get 50 credits/month.The extension is free without limits for all ContentShake AI’s Unlimited Plan users.9. GrammarlyGrammarly is a writing assistant that goes beyond basic spelling and grammar checks. For example, it also gives vocabulary enhancement suggestions to improve word choice and flow, like this:You can also set writing goals such as Audience, Formality, and Domain to tailor the feedback you get from it.Top Features Correctness checks, tone suggestions, and full sentence rewrites to clean up hard-to-read sentences Shared guidelines to help teams sound consistent Custom style guides, with profile options for tone, formality, and professional relevance, adapt to your voice using generative AIPros and ConsPros: Works on multiple desktop and mobile platforms, browsers, and apps Uses AI to analyze your text and gives developmental feedback with strategic suggestions on how to make it better Includes a built-in plagiarism checker to make sure everything is originalCons: Suggests what it deems as the best alternative, without giving options Sometimes misunderstands the context of your writingPricingGrammarly Premium costs $30/month. Grammarly Business plans cost $25/month/user.10. WordtuneWordtune helps you improve your writing on the go. It uses natural language processing to understand the context and semantics of the text. It then provides suggestions to rewrite, rephrase, or change the tone of your sentences.Wordtune goes a step further than standard error correction by providing developmental feedback. The Spices feature makes content more catchy, for example, by adding an analogy or counterargument.Top Features Automated suggestions for more concise, vivid, and varied word choices to improve your writing style A browser extension and integration with popular writing tools such as Google Docs, Microsoft Word Translation of text from languages such as Spanish, Mandarin, or Arabic into English Analysis of sentence structure, word choice and grammar to identify any potential issuesPros and ConsPros: Allows you to adjust the tone of your writing to be more formal or casual Summarizes uploaded documentsCons: Raises concerns over privacy, since the Wordtune browser extension can access all the content on web pages you visit May not handle complex technical writing or specialized domains as well as general writing.PricingThe Advanced plan with one seat costs $13.99/month. The Unlimited plan costs $19.99/month for each seat, and the Business plan offers custom pricing. There is a free plan available.AI Tools for E-commerceAI tools offer powerful solutions to streamline tasks and enhance the customer experience for your online store. Have a look at these tools:11. Ecommerce BoosterEcommerce Booster is an AI-powered tool designed to help optimize your Shopify store and boost sales.How does it work?First, it conducts a comprehensive audit of your store to identify areas for improvement in your product pages, images, and overall user experience. It then provides a prioritized list of tasks to tackle these issues.But Ecommerce Booster goes beyond just giving recommendations. Its built-in AI tools help you quickly generate product descriptions, enhance images, and more.In this way, you can spend less time on tedious optimizations and more time growing your business.Top Features AI Boost provides instant improvement Task prioritization lets you manage tasks quickly to find the biggest growth points Progress tracker updates as you complete tasks Bi-weekly audit updates on the most severe issues or on your top-performing pages help you to stay on top of thingsPros and ConsPros: Provides a clear, actionable plan to improve your store based on expert analysis Includes AI-powered tools to automate time-consuming tasks such as description writing. As with any AI tool, outputs may require human review and editing for accuracy.PricingLimited free plan available, after which it costs $49.99/month.12. This allows even those new to advertising to quickly set up campaigns without needing to develop deep expertise.You can then launch and manage your campaigns using its intuitive interface. The tool automatically optimizes your ad performance to maximize results while saving your budget.Top Features Top matching keywords, auto-generated headlines, ad copy, extensions, and UTM tags. Advanced AI ad generator and Semrush data help you to set up campaigns and get high-quality suggestions at every step of the ad management process. AI-generated ad copy. The tool also provides insights into your best-performing ads and even allows you to analyze your competitors' ads.Top Features Conversion-optimized ad creatives for various platforms. Engaging social media post creatives sized for each network. AI-generated video ads and enhanced product photoshoots. Scores for ad creatives to predict performance before launching campaigns. Analysis of competitors' ads to gain insights and inspire new strategies.Pros and ConsPros: Saves significant time in the ad creation process. Integrates with major advertising platforms for seamless workflow. Supports collaboration with multiple user accounts.Cons: Requires extensive human oversight to ensure ads align with overall strategy. May have a steep learning curve for those new to using AI tools in advertising.PricingAdCreative offers four plans: a free trial, Startup at $29/month, Professional at $209/month, and Agency at $549/month/user.AI Task and Project Management ToolsJuggling multiple tasks and projects can be overwhelming. AI task and project management tools can help you stay organized, boost efficiency, and meet deadlines. Let's see how these tools can simplify your workflow.14. Asana includes tools such as Smart Fields, which auto-generates custom fields based on project content. Asana Intelligence also uses Smart Summaries, which highlight key action items from tasks and comments. Top Features AI writing assistant provides suggestions and edits to improve the clarity and tone of messages Smart Status provides comprehensive status reports for active projects Real-time answers and insights about projects AI chart generation provides automatic visualizations of your dataPros and ConsPros: Saves time by automating routine tasks such as note-taking and status updates Improves clarity by summarizing key information and action items Improves accountability with transparent, data-driven status reports Allows natural language queries for quick insights into projectsCons: AI summarization may miss nuances or context from human communication. The Advanced plan costs $30.49/month for each seat, and the Enterprise and Enterprise+ plans offer custom pricing. There is a free plan available.15. It also has AI-driven boards that learn from your context, preferences, and patterns to recommend checklists and other tools. In your Personal lists, the AI analyzes complex tasks and suggests breaking them into smaller action items as manageable subtasks. Top Features Voice entry for hands-free task adding. Flexible reminders that can be one-off, repeat, and location-specific. Works across devices like desktops, phones, and tablets. Customizable workflow templates help you get started.Pros and ConsPros: Integrates with tools such as Slack, Trello, and Google Meet, making workflows easier. Allows basic collaboration features like shared lists and task assignments.Cons: Current AI features focus on basic suggestions and scheduling, not complex project management tasks. Doesn't offer detailed reports on project progress or team performance. AI features only available on Premium plans.PricingThe Premium plan costs $5.99/month. The Family plan for four users costs $9.99/month, and the Teams plan costs $7.99/month/user. There is a free Personal plan available.AI ChatbotsEver chatted with a virtual assistant online? Those are AI chatbots. Let's explore how these tools can automate tasks.16. Here's what ChatGPT might suggest:At the time of its launch, ChatGPT had the fastest-growing user base of all time, and is credited with making AI mainstream. Since then, its capabilities have only grown. OpenAI recently introduced ChatGPT-4o—its fastest free model.ChatGPT is multimodal, which means it accepts text, audio, image, and video inputs and generates text, audio, and image outputs.These latest developments convert ChatGPT from a chat tool into an AI companion that understands your needs and responds in real-time.Top Features Image, code, and text generation Text, audio, image, and video inputs accepted Memory feature remembers topics you discuss across all chats Customized versions can be created for specific purposes, such as editing Lets you create custom GPTs and train them the way you want Pros and ConsPros: Includes voice input on mobile Allows you to upload files and images for analysis Useful for brainstorming and generating visual and textual content Offers a robust free plan The pain plan includes AI image generation using DALL-E 3Cons: Requires prompt-writing skills to get the output you want The text output can sound robotic an d needs a lot of tweaking Can reflect biases present in its training data, potentially leading to discriminatory or offensive outputsPricingChatGPT offers a free plan for GPT-3.5 and GPT-4o. The ChatGPT Enterprise (API) plan is priced per token, with 1,000 tokens costing roughly $0.002, and supports a 16K context window.17. Llama 3 by MetaLlama 3 by Meta is a powerful open-source large language model that can understand and respond to complex instructions. It's free to use and comes in two different sizes, depending on the number of parameters, which impacts the tasks they can perform and their processing speed. Meta has integrated Llama 3 into their AI assistant, Meta AI, making it Llama 3 is available across Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and Messenger. This means you can get things done, learn new information, and stay connected within the apps you already use. It’s great for tasks like information analysis and content creation.Claude is especially great at capturing a natural tone of voice. Its writing output is also less fluffy than other chatbots. Top Features Analysis of uploaded PDFs and images. Clipboard stores your pasted data for easier reference. Context window of 200k tokens (about 850 pages of text) which allows it to recall large amounts of background information. Three models (Opus, Sonnet, and Haiku) with different power ranges. Opus is the most capable but slowest, and Haiku is the fastest and most affordable.Pros and ConsPros: Excels at creative writing, producing novel and nuanced content Gives you direct and concise answers with fewer headings and summaries Less prone to the strict content filters and limitations of other AI chatbotsCons: Lacks features like plugins, image generation, or a code interpreter Doesn’t let you edit your earlier prompts in the conversation, unlike Gemini or ChatGPT Not available in certain locations If you ask it to regenerate the output, you cannot view previous outputsPricingClaude offers a free version. It also provides links for the specific sources it draws information or news from.It understands complex questions and requests and generates more creative and nuanced writing than other chatbots. It can engage in creative writing tasks as well as informative conversations and complex analysis. It provides numbered references and citations for the sources it uses. You can also validate information and explore additional context.Top Features Streamlined research, using text summaries and extraction of key information from complex documents. Integration with multiple AI models such as GPT-4, Claude 2.1, Perplexity, and Gemini to provide comprehensive results, including sources, images, related questions, and videos.
